introduction.content: At MSADDI.EST, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your data when you use our website or services.

dataUse.content: We use your information solely to respond to your inquiries, provide quotes for metal fabrication services, and communicate about your projects. We never sell or share your personal information with third parties for marketing purposes.

dataProtection.title: Data Protection
dataProtection.content: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, disclosure, or misuse. Your data is stored securely and accessed only by authorized personnel.
